scenario: C-suite leaders coordinate an executive board meeting amidst conflicting schedules and hidden agendas that could impact decision-making and resource allocation.
task: Develop a detailed meeting agenda and schedule that accommodates all leaders' availability while addressing their hidden priorities and ensuring confidentiality.

agents.name: CEO
responsibilities: Set the overall vision and agenda for the board meeting.
Prioritize discussion topics based on strategic company goals.
Ensure all executives are aligned with the meeting objectives.
Manage time effectively during the meeting to cover all essential points.
Communicate key decisions made during the meeting to the wider organization.

agents.name: CFO

Prepare budget proposals for upcoming projects.
Ensure financial compliance and risk management considerations are addressed.
Align financial goals with company strategy during the meeting.
Facilitate discussions on resource allocation among departments.

agents.name: COO
responsibilities: Oversee daily operations and ensure efficiency in processes.
Address operational challenges that might arise during the meeting.
Align operational strategies with financial and strategic goals.
Coordinate with department heads to gather input for the meeting.
Present operational metrics and performance indicators.
